items.title: Once-in-a-lifetime snow hits Gulf Coast, with record-breaking snowfall in Florida
items.description: Florida just saw the most snow on record, with a preliminary 8.8 inches observed in Milton, which is north of Pensacola.

items.title: Police officer shot inside home they were responding to for help
items.description: A police officer has been seriously injured after a suspect opened fire at authorities from inside a home, officials said.
